title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions with local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap Ollama models into any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama-webui-lite
summary: Lightweight SvelteKit front-end that talks to your local Ollama server.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement via VS Code extension.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for CPU & GPU inference with Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interface.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting C# and F# with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Lightweight C# client using System.Net.Http with minimal dependencies.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that threads replies using Ollama and supports @bot mentions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your vault for summarization & Q&A.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Curated list of tools, integrations, tutorials, and examples for the Ollama ecosystem.
